issue: Production Google sign-in looped back to signed-out screen; URL reset to mfv release token.

changes.summary: Switched provider auth to popup-first across environments with redirect fallback for popup-blocked/unsupported cases.
Hardened cache-reset script to avoid re-replacing URL when mfv already equals release token.

webLint.note: Pre-existing unrelated lint error in web/src/views/SupportView.tsx:276 (unused caught error variable).

prodPopupSmoke.command: playwright headless check for Continue with Google
